mapper.select:
select d.IMSI_CUM from LTE_REGION_NUM_HOUR d where d.REGIONTYPE='Indoor' and d.REGION=#{region} and to_date(d.Sdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss') in
to_date(#{item},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
order by to_date(d.Sdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss') asc
select nvl(sum(d.IMSI_CUM),0) from LTE_REGION_NUM_HOUR d where d.REGIONTYPE='Indoor' and to_date(d.Sdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss')=to_date(#{dateStr},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and d.REGION=#{region}

select * from ( select d.IMSI_MALE as "imsiMale" ,d.sdate as "sdate" ,d.IMSI_FEMALE as "imsiFeMale" ,d.IMSI_AGE1 as "imsiAge1" ,d.IMSI_AGE2 as "imsiAge2" ,d.IMSI_AGE3 as "imsiAge3" ,d.IMSI_AGE4 as "imsiAge4" ,d.IMSI_AGE5 as "imsiAge5" ,d.IMSI_SOURCE1 as "imsiSource1" ,d.IMSI_SOURCE2 as "imsiSource2" ,rownum as rn from LTE_REGION_NUM_HOUR d where d.REGIONTYPE='Indoor' and d.REGION=#{region} order by d.Sdate desc ) where rn=1
